duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and build new capabilities and/or enhancements to ERP products, platforms, and features/applications focusing on Manufacturing and Quality Management processes.
Understand Supply Chain business processes and work closely with business partners to deliver technology backlog supporting the business process.
Manage demand planning, analysis, prioritization, and execution to ensure quality for IT process capabilities for ERP Product line.
Interface and handle relationships across teams, proactively match business needs with existing ERP technology capability, and drive adoption of core systems.
Write, manage, and refine user stories while defining clear acceptance criteria and explaining the business ask, intent, process, and requirements to technical team members.

Negotiate with the business to prioritize the backlog based on capacity, business value, and priority, and report back to the business on the status of the delivery of features, functionality, and applications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
